item.title: Valley Family Fun
item.description: People who are new to the area (and some who are not) often ask Laura Churchill Duke what they can do with their families in the Valley. This made her realize that there isnâ€™t one central place to look for information. Valley Family Fun is a compilation of what she’s discovered! Follow VFF on their Facebook group too.
